title: Ticket #7264: COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS too noisy to be useful
description:
When investigating configuration options for DESY's Jupyter anchor, I tried setting the anchor's COLLECTOR_REQUIREMENTS to throw away ads that weren't for slots dedicated to Jupyter jobs. This produced enough logging (a warning on every filtered ad, and the whole ad) that it seemed like it would render the knob useless.

Move the warning to a higher debug level than D_ALWAYS. Don't print the rejected ad unless D_MACHINE_AD is also set.
remarks:
2019-Sep-19 15:27:17 by tlmiller:
See run ID 481785.

2019-Oct-11 09:54:44 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW changes look good. IsDebugLevel test is a minor optimization in this case, can could be omitted.
